text: Abbott and Costello Go to Mars is a 1953 American science fiction comedy movie. It is directed by Charles Lamont. Actors include: Bud Abbott, Lou Costello, Mari Blanchard, Robert Paige, Dudley Dickerson, and Harry Shearer. The movie was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1953 science fiction movies Category:1953 comedy movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Charles Lamont
title: Abbott and Costello Go to Mars
